item.Q:
Write the character:
to have; there is; there are; to exist; to be
item.A:
yǒu
没有 (沒有) méiyǒu haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be

item.Q:
Write the character:
to (a place); until (a time); up to; to go; to arrive
item.A:
dào
得到 dédào to get; to obtain; to receive

rú
如果 rúguǒ if; in case; in the event that

item.Q:
Write the character:
finish; complete; accomplish; become; turn into; win; succeed; one tenth; surname
item.A:
chéng
形成 xíngchéng to form; to take shape

nián
青年 qīngnián youth

item.Q:
Write the character:
new; newly; abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆; meso- (chem.)
item.A:
xīn
重新 chóngxīn again; once more; re-

item.Q:
Write the character:
idea; meaning; wish; desire; intention; (abbr.) Italy
item.A:
yì
注意 zhùyì take note of; (pay) attention (to)

item.Q:
Write the character:
matter; thing; item; work; affair
item.A:
shì
事业 (事業) shìyè undertaking; project; activity; (charitable, political or revolutionary) cause; publicly funded institution, enterprise or foundation

cǐ
因此 yīncǐ that is why; for that reason; therefore; for this reason

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: all right; capable; competent; OK; okay; to go; to do; to travel; temporary; to walk; to go; will do
2: a row; profession; professional
item.A:
1: xíng 2: háng
进行 (進行) jìnxíng to advance; to conduct; underway; in progress; to do; to carry out; to carry on; to conduct; to execute 银行 (銀行) yínháng bank

a row; profession; professional
银行 (銀行) yínháng bank

traditional: 農曆
nónglì the traditional Chinese calendar; the lunar calendar

traditional: 陽曆
yánglì solar calendar

traditional: 陰曆
yīnlì lunar calendar
bǐcǐ each other; one another
jiànkāng health; healthy
rúyì as one wants; according to one's wishes

traditional: 萬事
wànshì all things
chúxī (New Year's) Eve
yuándàn New Year's Day
pèngdào to come across; to run into; to meet
jìarì holiday; non-working day

traditional: 豐盛
fēngshèng rich; sumptuous

traditional: 年夜飯
niányèfàn New Year's Eve family dinner
yíngjiē to meet; to welcome; to greet
chénggōng success; to succeed

traditional: 俗話
súhuà common saying; proverb
jíxiáng lucky
píngān safe and sound; well; without mishap

traditional: 順利
shùnlì smoothly; without a hitch

traditional: 熱鬧
rènao bustling with noise and excitement; lively
rènào exciting

traditional: 春聯
chūnlián Spring Festival couplets; New Year scrolls

traditional: 壓歲錢
yāsuìqián money given to children as new year present
biānpào firecrackers
dǎpái to play mahjong or cards

traditional: 習俗
xísú custom; tradition; local tradition; convention

traditional: 活動
huódòng activity; exercise; behavior

traditional: 遊行
yóuxíng march; parade; demonstration
